name: The Villainess Just Wants to Eat!!
summary: Life’s greatest pleasures are food and fantasy manhwa. When reading, you can drool over hot characters and delicious looking food. After a late night of reading your favorite manhwa, you fall into the land of sleep and dream of being the fiance of the prince…only it isn't a dream! You’ve been reincarnated as the villainess! Will you be able to survive and live your dream of eating delicious food, or will you suffer the deadly fate of all villainesses?
